description:
Some offices have stereotypical dynamics: the chauvinistic pig of a boss who never does any real work; the employees whose goal is to suck up to the boss; the ones whose lives seem perfect; and the individuals who have all the actual work pushed onto them. Retsuko the red panda is in the last group, as she stays late most nights to make up the work her coworkers are too lazy to do themselves.

Her relief from the stress of her everyday life comes in the form of singing death metal at a local karaoke club. Night after night, Retsuko channels her grief into a microphone and considers the place to be her own personal sanctuary. But as she moves further away from her comfort zone and the ideas people have of her, she discovers that letting others into her world of death metal may not be such a bad thing.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Office Lady
tags.description: Prominently features a female office worker or OL.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Metal Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of metal, not to be applied to anime that use metal in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Office
tags.description: Features people who work in a business office.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Primarily Animal Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed animal or animal-like characters.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Rock Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

title.native: アグレッシブ烈子 シーズン2
アグレッシブ烈子：We Wish You a Metal Christmas

node.description:
**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.

Houno Satoshi is a Japanese composer and arranger, affiliated with Sound Drive.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_hono)

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/jussaramarques/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Jussara44820803) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/jussaramarquesatriz) | [IMDb](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm3779142)

Jussara Marques de Oliveira is a Brazilian actress, voice actress and dubbing director.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Debby Ryan (Most of the productions)
- Rebeka "Rebe" Parrilla de Bormujo Ávalos (Elite)
